author: acolytec3
content: Shameless plug (and also request for comment/experimentation) - I finally managed to put together a terrible web app that uses the `kzg-wasm` library that the EthJS team recently put together.  If anybody wants to try posting a blob to Holesky using only Metamask, would be curious to know if anyone else succeeds. I've managed to push a few through (though my gas estimation doesn't seem to always work well so sometimes the blob txns never get included in a block.  https://blobs4every1.vercel.app/ The underlying library is here - https://github.com/ethereumjs/kzg-wasm - note - it's known to not work with NextJS currently
